overview: A 98-year-old young woman: Vitale. She loses her great love, she returns home after forty years of exile, receives the most important literary award in the Spanish language and goes on tour. Ida Vitale travels without moving away from herself, attentive to what no one sees. From A to Z, Ida moves within a slow parenthesis: a tour full of unheard-of stops.
title: Ida Vitale
